property.caption: Annotation data
property.description: The attribute to hold all annotation data. Use an unlimited length string!

property.caption: Allow change
property.description: Whether to allow creating and changing of annotations. Turn off to show existing annotations only.

property.caption: On change MF
property.description: Optional, the microflow to execute after any change on the annotations.

property.caption: Image class
property.description: Specify class(es) to be put on the image
